Package guardians.model.validation.validators

Contains the algorithms used to validate the entities.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbsenceDatesValidator
    This class is used to validate the Absences annotated with ValidAbsenceDates It checks that the start date is before the end date.
    CalendarValidator
    This validator will make sure that a Calendar contains all the DayConfigurations given its month and year
    CycleChangeValidator
    This validator is used to make sure the giver and receiver Doctors of a CycleChange are different.
    DayMonthYearCycleChangeValidator
    This class will apply the validation done by DayMonthYearValidator to a CycleChange
    DayMonthYearDayConfigurationValidator
    This class will apply the validation done by DayMonthYearValidator to a DayConfiguration
    DayMonthYearScheduleDayValidator
    This class will apply the validation done by DayMonthYearValidator to a ScheduleDay
    DayMonthYearShiftCycleValidator
    This class will apply the validation done by DayMonthYearValidator to a ShiftCycle
    DayMonthYearValidator
    This class will make sure that, provided a day, month and year, they are valid.
    DaysOfMonthChecker<Day extends AbstractDay>
    This class will check that all days of a given YearMonth exist in a given list of AbstractDay.
    ScheduleValidator
    This validator will make sure that if a Schedule is created, it will have all the necessary days within the given month.
    ShiftConfigurationValidator
    This class is used to validate the ShiftConfigurations annotated with ValidShiftConfiguration Particularly, this class is used to make sure that the number of minimum shifts a Doctor does is less than or equal to its maximum number of shifts
    ShiftPreferencesDayConfigValidator
    This validator applies the algorithm in ShiftPreferencesValidator to the shift preferences of a DayConfiguration
    ShiftPreferencesShiftConfigValidator
    This validator applies the algorithm in ShiftPreferencesValidator to the shift preferences of a ShiftConfiguration
    ShiftPreferencesValidator<ShiftType>
    This class contains the algorithm used to make sure shift preferences do not clash with one another.

Package guardians.model.validation.validators Description

Contains the algorithms used to validate the entities. This classes are used by guardians.model.validations.annotations
Author:
miggoncan
